mapper.select: SELECT f.dws_id, f.df_trade_id, f.send_status, DATE_FORMAT(f.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')create_time, f.buyer_ww, f.buyer_qq, f.buyer_telephone, f.receiver_name, f.receiver_phone, f.buyer_remark, f.money, f.express_fee, f.express_name, f.express_code, f.receiver_address, f.bar_code_key, d.df_order_id, d.pic_path, d.title, d.prop_str, d.goods_code, d.single_price, d.single_pi_price, d.goods_num, d.take_goods_status, d.refund_status, d.store_goods_code FROM( select * from daifa_wait_send where dws_id in (${dwsIds}) )f LEFT JOIN( select dws_id, cdkey, df_order_id, pic_path, title, prop_str, goods_code, single_price, single_pi_price, goods_num, take_goods_status, refund_status, store_goods_code from daifa_wait_send_order where dws_id in (${dwsIds}) )d ON f.DWS_ID = d.DWS_ID
